name: Connect (itch) (LogicalByte)
description:
Connect is a classic logic game. The game is inspired by Hashiwokakero logic puzzles. Chips are placed on a circuit board and the player has to place connections between them.

Rules

  • The number of outgoing/incomming connections must match exactly the number on their chips,
  • connections must not cross each other and
  • a coherent network of connections must be built.

Featurelist

  • Solo-, Coop- and Battlemode
  • Variable bordsize
  • Storable highscore
  • 4.294.967.296 gameboard variants
  • Music included (with 1MB RAM)

System requirement

  • All PAL-Amiga (NTSC-support maybe later) with Kickstart v1.3 minimum
  • At least 512kb Chipmem (+512kb of any ram for music)
  • Harddisc supported (installer included)
  • WinUAE compatible
